name: Green "Enchilada" Chicken Casserole
ingredients: 4 cups cubed cooked chicken or turkey

instructions.en: Grease an 11x7" baking pan. Put chicken in the pan and toss with taco seasoning to coat.
Soften cream cheese and whisk well with chives and green salsa in a medium bowl.
Stir chopped green chiles into the cream cheese mixture.
Pour sauce evenly over chicken. (Optional: mix it in)
Top with shredded Monterey jack cheese.
Bake at 350ยบ for 25 minutes, until hot and bubbly.
Remove from oven and immediately sprinkle with chopped green onions.

notes: Makes 6-8 servings. Do not freeze. Seasoning for Tacos is assumed to be a separate recipe.
